text: Hey Steven! I might be misunderstanding but you can already used coded custom modules inside the beta drag and drop editor. They should show up under the "+ More" group of modules. Are you seeing issues with it?

Sorry, what I meant to say is, can we use our own custom base templates yet?

I want to be able to use partials to build the basis of a template then drag in custom modules onto it.

Ah gotcha, not quite yet but we're not a million miles away from it. It's something that we're working on, we're just trying to learn from the mistakes of email templating of past and get it right from the outset this time around. It might take us a little while still to have something fully customisable but rest assured it's something we're working on

That's awesome, is my example something that will be possible?

I'm enjoying using macros and partials which is exactly how I build websites using Twig 2 (Craft CMS).

If so then maybe we can use things like -

```{% include ('blog/_partials/_block_' ~ {{customer.variable.here}}) %}```
